title: Death prediction app launches ‘AI health concierge’
summary: Death Clock adds AI-powered blood biomarker analysis and preventive health guidance in new Life Lab offering. Provocatively-named digital health startup Death Clock has launched an AI-driven tool designed to make longevity services offered by concierge medicine and elite wellness clinics more accessible to a mass audience. The San Francisco–based company, best known for its […] The post Death prediction app launches ‘AI health concierge’ appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
author: Danny Sullivan
